name: part_012
file: tmp_【 告知あり 】沙花叉アニソンフェス開催！2周年もありがとう！#沙花叉アニソンフェス 【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [E8HL1I2C_ZQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs her original song 'Bebé' during her 2nd anniversary live concert.
MC section at the end of the concert where Chloe expresses her gratitude to the fans.

subtitles.original: 右左君君右上向きゃるんめちゃかわ！
subtitles.english: Right, left, you, you, looking up-right, so cute!

subtitles.original: （ふわふわ！）
subtitles.english: (Fluffy!)

subtitles.original: 斜め右あざとさ舌ペロマジ顔もめちゃかわいい！
subtitles.english: Sly glance right, tongue out, your serious face is so cute!

subtitles.original: 夜ふかし極めて逆に健康だ
subtitles.english: Staying up late to the extreme makes me healthy instead

subtitles.original: 「宿題10週過ぎてます！」
subtitles.english: "Homework is 10 weeks overdue!"

subtitles.original: 「炎上だけは勘弁です」
subtitles.english: "Please, anything but a controversy."

subtitles.original: (そうは言われても約束できない
subtitles.english: (Even if you say that, I can't promise

subtitles.original: 好きな事だけ爆速でいたい)
subtitles.english: I want to go full speed with only things I like)

subtitles.original: 「そんな所も大好きです！」
subtitles.english: "I love that about you too!"

subtitles.original: 「今日も生きててえらちゃんです！」
subtitles.english: "Good job for living today too!"

subtitles.original: (そう褒められると申し訳ない…
subtitles.english: (When praised like that, I feel bad...

subtitles.original: 期待下潜った人間です…)
subtitles.english: I'm just a person who fell below expectations...)

subtitles.original: でもでも君だから
subtitles.english: But, but, because it's you

subtitles.original: 誓うまっすぐにひた向きに
subtitles.english: I swear, straightforwardly and single-mindedly

subtitles.original: 心揺らす君の為に
subtitles.english: For you, who shakes my heart

subtitles.original: ほら頭の先から爪まで
subtitles.english: Look, from the tip of my head to my nails

subtitles.original: 君好みのナチュラルスタイル
subtitles.english: A natural style just for you

subtitles.original: うさちゃんパジャマのままだし
subtitles.english: Still in my bunny pajamas

subtitles.original: 5度寝する日もあるけど
subtitles.english: Even if I sleep in five times some days

subtitles.original: でもいつでもエイムは君タゲ
subtitles.english: But my aim is always targeting you

subtitles.original: もう残弾ないけど撃ち抜け（ずきゅーん！）
subtitles.english: No more ammo left, but shoot through (Bang!)

subtitles.original: 調子に乗っても良いよね？
subtitles.english: It's okay to get carried away, right?

subtitles.original: 文句は後で聞きます…
subtitles.english: I'll listen to your complaints later...

subtitles.original: 右左君君右上向きゃるんめちゃかわ！
subtitles.english: Right, left, you, you, looking up-right, so cute!

subtitles.original: （ふわふわ！）
subtitles.english: (Fluffy!)

subtitles.original: 斜め右あざとさ舌ペロマジ顔もめちゃかわいい！
subtitles.english: Sly glance right, tongue out, your serious face is so cute!

subtitles.original: 2周年ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for the 2nd anniversary!

subtitles.original: 3周年目も、みんなよろしくねー！
subtitles.english: Please take care of me in our 3rd year too, everyone!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: That was fun! Thank you!
